resources.string:
It's exciting for baby, toddler, preschooler, kid and everyone who want to learn English. 
 Let's discover the world with over 400 words with beautiful images, voices and sounds. All of us can enjoy 18 categories which designed professionally and they are totally FREE. 

Categories include: Numbers, Alphabet, Transportation, Colors, Shapes, Animals, Clothing, Household items, Music Instruments, Birds, Flowers, Fruits, School, Fishes, Vegetable & Food,Sports and Traveling to discover the beautiful world.
Answer that the Picture and Text are matched or not.
Choose the correct sentence which is the text of picture.
You need to drag and drop words to make a meaning sentence match with picture.
Let\'s type words matching with picture displayed with text box.
You need to choose the right picture which has the meaning with text below it.
You need to drag and drop words to make a meaning word match with picture.
Drag the text from center place to the correspond picture at above or below the center place.
Choose the correct word which is the text of picture.

You need to drag and drop 3 images from bottom places to the correct boxes. Each box will be a place of a picture which has a relationship with the picture you put in it. Example: Motorcycle and Airplane are 2 items which have same category of transportation relationship here.
Answer that the Picture and Text are matched or not. Yes for the case of Picture match the Text meaning.
Choose an Picture that don\'t have relationship with others. Example: A Bird is not related to a Knife, Plate, Bowl which are in the kitcheen items.
You need to drag and drop Words or Numbers so that they can arrange in a sequence order like descendant or ascendant. Ex: 1,2,3,4,5,6

Sentences are a new level of children's learning. We categorized 6 menu items for sentence part. 

I am, Have something, Action Verb 1, Action Verb 2, Daily Routines, Senses and Feelings to help children can easily to start first step of making sentences. 
Children are visual learners so having a wide range of pictures really helps them to focus on the new sentences they are learning. Currently, we use tatoeba.org for audio sentences.
